@Mental_Piracy wrote:

[quote=“expozee, post:7, topic:393294”][quote author=Mental Piracy link=topic=490464.msg3586337#msg3586337 date=1304208692]
is your client class capitalized or not? (Client or client)
[/quote]
client[/quote]
then it should work fine if you changed it to “client”, regardless should post in the client section, might get better help.

oh remove the .cd/files and try again

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @expozee expozee
item.description:
@expozee wrote:

[quote=“Mental Piracy, post:4, topic:393294”][quote author=expozee link=topic=490464.msg3586322#msg3586322 date=1304208165]

this is client help.

And its trying to run your client from the jframe class, it should be running it from the client class. Change jframe to client.

now it says the same error, but instead of “jframe” it says “client”
[/quote]
do you have a client.java in the directory your run.bat is in[/quote]
yes, they are next to each other

Read full topic
